rows.label: qev051515_MSG0001
rows.name:
It seems that your opponent for the final match was my
grandfather's rival![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051515_MSG0002
rows.name:
He won the Wrothian Battle Gauntlet many times over.
His prowess is the stuff of legends![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051515_MSG0003
rows.name:
I would very much love the chance to test his strength,
but I imagine you are better suited for that task.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051515_MSG0004
rows.name:
But do not lose, human! For if I have to be defeated,
I wish to say I fell to the strongest warrior of all.[ST:wait ]
